definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: An unusually high amount of savings comes from large companies in China's corporate sector.
sentences.chinese: 超乎尋常的高額儲蓄來自中國的大企業。

sentences.english: Maybe they are simply great enough to receive without misgiving.
sentences.chinese: 或許他們只是超乎尋常，所以受之無愧。

sentences.english: My great aunt Joan is unusual in her independence.
sentences.chinese: 我那偉大的姨婆瓊是超乎尋常的獨立。
